about_the_game:
Voodoo Dolls is a first person action shooter, where you need to escape the Witch's Spooky Castle. Fight through endless corridors in 90s style mazes and dungeons. Inspired by Doom, Quake, Half-Life and Dusk.

Story

Once Upon A Time... Jack and Jill thought they lived 'Happily Ever After'. But they were being hunted by the Evil Witch. The Witch was old and ugly and she desperately wanted to be young and beautiful. An evil plan was set in motion to kidnap Jill for her beauty.

On Halloween Night, the Witch used an ancient spell to awaken the army of darkness. Voodoo Dolls rose from the dead through-out the land. They stole Jill and hid her in the tallest tower of the castle.

Challenges lay before Jack as he fights the cursed dolls. Jack needed to learn how to fight Voodoo Dolls, and quickly. Only Jack could save Jill by climbing the castle to the top. At sunrise, Jill will be sacrificed to the Witch. Jack has one night to climb the castle to save Jill....

Gameplay

Action packed and fast paced, Voodoo Dolls will bring a nostalgic gaming feel in a modern designed environment. Use the Pistol, Shotgun, Machine Gun, Elephant Gun, & Magical Powers to stop the evil Voodoo Dolls from taking Jill from her beloved Jack.

content_descriptors.notes: As a First Person Shooter, Voodoo Dolls depicts violence with weapons such as a pistol or shotgun to kill fantasy characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The only way to save his beloved Jill from her death, is for Jack to shoot through hordes of Voodoo Dolls at the Witch's Halloween Party. Voodoo Dolls is an original FPS Video Game packed with fast paced action and non-linear 90s style dungeons.
